dialogs.patient: I have been having a lot of nausea and vomiting recently. ask me more questions
dialogs.doctor: What is the nature of your stomach pain? Is it sharp, dull, or cramping?

dialogs.patient: I have trouble with sleeping and my sleep pattern is not constant.
dialogs.doctor: Do you have any other symptoms?

You may be experiencing symptoms of gastroenteritis, which is an inflammation of the stomach and intestines. Other symptoms include diarrhea, fever, and abdominal cramps. I recommend that you see a doctor for further evaluation and treatment.
